snippet: Officials said at least 34 people were killed on Wednesday when gunmen started shooting in the Potiskum market in Yobe State as they tried to steal cattle.
abstract: At least 34 people are killed in Nigeria during a shoot-out triggered by a failed cattle raid in the Potiskum market in Yobe State.
lead_paragraph: Officials said at least 34 people were killed on Wednesday when gunmen started shooting in the Potiskum market in Yobe State as they tried to steal cattle.

headline.main: Nigeria: Gunmen Kill Dozens at Market
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Gunmen Kill Dozens at Market
